cards.name: Black Panther
cards.ability: On Reveal: Double this card's Power.

cards.name: Black Swan
cards.ability: Activate: Until the end of next turn, your 1-Cost cards cost 0.

cards.name: Frigga
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add a copy of the last card you played to your hand. (if able)

cards.name: Galactus
cards.ability: On Reveal: If you're winning this location and this is your only card here, destroy all other locations.

cards.name: Hela
cards.ability: On Reveal: Resurrect all cards you discarded to random locations with -3 Power.

cards.name: Hellcow
cards.ability: Activate: Discard 2 cards from your hand.

cards.name: Hercules
cards.ability: The first time another card moves here each turn, move it to another location.

cards.name: Kraven
cards.ability: When a card moves here, this gains +2 Power.

cards.name: Marvel Boy
cards.ability: After each turn, give 3 of your 1-Cost cards +1 Power.

cards.name: Negasonic Teenage Warhead
cards.ability: After an enemy card is played here, destroy it. (once per game)

cards.name: Scorn
cards.ability: When you discard this, return it to your hand and give +2 Power to itself and one of your cards in play.

cards.name: Surtur
cards.ability: After you play a card with 10+ Power, this gains +3 Power.

cards.name: Sword Master
cards.ability: On Reveal: Discard an odd-costed card from your hand.

cards.name: Symbiote Spider-Man
cards.ability: Activate: Merge your lowest-Cost card here with this. Copy its text like it just revealed.

cards.name: War Machine
cards.ability: Ongoing: Nothing can stop you from playing cards anywhere.

locations.name: Valhalla
locations.ability: After turn 4, repeat the On Reveal abilities of cards here.

locations.name: Yggdrasil
locations.ability: After each turn, give ALL cards at another location +1 Power.

items.name: Sandman
changes: 5/6 - On Reveal: Players can only play 1 card next turn.
5/7 - On Reveal: Next turn, cards cost 1 more. (maximum 6)

items.name: Mockingbird
changes: 6/10 - Costs 1 less for each of your cards in play that didn't start in your deck.

items.name: Aero
changes: 5/9 - On Reveal: Move the last enemy card played anywhere to this location.

items.name: Black Cat
changes: 4/9 - If this is in your hand after the turn, discard it.

items.name: Ghost Rider
changes: 4/3 - On Reveal: Bring back one of your discarded cards to this location.

items.name: Moon Girl
changes: 4/4 - On Reveal: Duplicate your hand.

items.name: War Machine
changes: 4/7 - On Reveal: Until the end of next turn, nothing can stop you from playing cards anywhere.
4/7 - Ongoing: Nothing can stop you from playing cards anywhere.

items.name: Agatha Harkness
changes: 6/14 - Agatha starts in your hand and plays your cards for you.
6/14 - Agatha starts in your hand. She plays your cards for you on even turns.

items.name: Black Swan
changes: 3/5 - On Reveal: Until the end of next turn, your 1-Cost cards cost 0.
2/3 - Activate: Until the end of next turn, your 1-Cost cards cost 0.

items.name: Hellcow
changes: 4/8 - On Reveal: Discard 2 cards from your hand.
4/6 - Activate: Discard 2 cards from your hand.

items.name: Sword Master
changes: 3/7 - On Reveal: Discard a card from your hand.
3/7 - On Reveal: Discard an odd-costed card from your hand.

changes: 6/6 - On Reveal: Resurrect all cards you discarded to random locations with -2 Power.
6/7 - On Reveal: Resurrect all cards you discarded to random locations with -3 Power.

changes: 3/2 - After each turn, give 3 of your 1-Cost cards +1 Power.

changes: 4/7 - Ongoing: Nothing can stop you from playing cards anywhere.
